programme.title: Curieux Bégin
programme.desc: 1980s inspirations We rediscover the culinary culture of the 1980s with our idols: Mario Pelchat, Martine St-Clair and Sonia Benezra. The chef Julien Phavorachith explores the emblematic dishes of the day. Presenter: Christian Bégin.

programme.title: La recette de Guy Martin
programme.desc: Suprême de pintade de Licques, en croûte d'ail noire et chicorée, endives et carottes au curcuma Le chef étoilé Guy Martin présente les produits emblématiques du terroir français et propose une recette pour les accommoder. Présentation : Guy Martin.

programme.title: 5 chefs dans ma cuisine
programme.sub-title: Magret de canard et riz sauvage
programme.desc: Breast of duck with wild rice Two recipes by Lysanne O'Bomsawin, inspired by Abenaki culture: breast of duck with spruce beer sauce and wild rice with cranberries and hazelnuts. Presented by: Marina Orsini. Directed by: Nicole Dussault, David Gauthier, Stéphane Rocheleau, Léo Boulanger (Canada, 2020)

programme.title: De par chez nous
programme.desc: Business development For Nicole Guertin, owner of the Suites des présidents in Haileybury (Ontario) and for Évelyne Gélinas and Marie-Claude Trempe of Rien ne se perd, tout se crée in Saint-Sévère (Quebec), the region is synonymous with business success. Presenter: Marième Ndiaye. Directed by: Julie Lambert, Catherine Leblanc (season 3, Canada, 2018)

programme.title: Ma vie rurale
programme.desc: Episode 6 With the success of their mini-vegetables, Yolande and Pascal, permaculture market-gardeners in the Lot-et-Garonne, decide to scale up production. In the Drôme, Audrey and Didier's truffle season has begun but the "black diamond" is also much sought-after by thieves. In Corsica, Emanuele can finally take his chestnuts to the mill. Directed by: Frédéric Martin (France, 2021)

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: We are what we eat "I am what I eat..." is what André Giordan physiologist and epistemologist from Geneva University, invites us to understand.

programme.title: Massi en mission
programme.desc: The astronaut David Saint-Jacques challenges the YouTuber Massi Mahiou to prepare for a future space mission. But how exactly do astronauts train? What sort of experiments do they carry out? How do they live with zero gravity? Massi discovers all he needs to know about the mission and about space.

programme.title: L'Afrik en conte
programme.desc: The co-wives A man marries two women, but loves the second more than the first. So the first wife dreams up a scheme to imprison the young woman and her baby inside a tree trunk. Directed by: Franck Fokus (Côte d'Ivoire, 2022)

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
Sometimes you just can't win!
Failing at something is never funny, but it isn't necessarily all that serious either! And, above all, the important thing is to accept that you aren't always going to be the best. Don't you agree Rocky?
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: Comme des reines
programme.desc:
Suffocating in her straight-laced family where she feels she doesn't belong, intoxicated by her desire for easy money, Samia allows Louise and her boyfriend, a pimp, to draw her into a network of prostitution. Very quickly, the trap closes.

Directed by: Marion Vernoux (France, 2020)

Cast: Sarah Isabella (Samia), Nina Louise (Louise), Bintou Ba (Jessica), Idir Azougli (Nico), Bernard Campan (Jean-Philippe), Karole Rocher (Mona), Nathalie Richard (Aline)

Genre: drama

Awards: Pyrénées d'Or for best single fiction, best male actor and best newcomer at the 2021 Luchon Festival; Press jury prize; jury special mention in the television film category at the 2021 Prix Europa

programme.title: Mata Hari, agent H21
programme.desc:
In 1914, Mata Hari, a beautiful Javanese dancer, began spying for Germany. On the orders of a certain Ludovic, she entices François Lassalle to her home in order to steal the valuable documents in his possession. Her mission is successful, but Mata Hari falls in love with the French officer...

Directed by: Jean-Louis Richard (France/Italy, 1964)

Cast: Jeanne Moreau, Jean-Louis Trintignant, Claude Rich

Genre: History

programme.title: Faits divers
programme.sub-title: Les heures avant la fuite des deux frères
programme.desc: Episode 9: The hours before the two brothers take flight The investigators prepare to arrest Paulo and Francine, but they've disappeared. They don't know that the mafia and the Lauzons got there first. Held in a warehouse, Francine tries to persuade Tony that she's not involved in the murders and Jimmy's attempted murder. As for Paulo, he's managed to escape... Directed by: Stéphane Lapointe (season 2, Canada, 2018) Screenplay: Joanne Arseneau Cast: Isabelle Blais (Constance Forest), Fred-Éric Salvail (Antoine Chevrier-Marseau), Émile Proulx-Cloutier (Frédérik Bérubé), Maxime Mailloux (Jonas), Patrick Hivon (Sylvain Lauzon), Rachel Graton (Rachelle Lauzon), Alexandre Goyette (Jimmy O'Connor), Luc Senay (Paulo Fauteux), Chantal Baril (Francine Bienvenue), Roger Léger (Maurice Lauzon), Alexa-Jeanne Dubé (Zoé Forest), Guy Nadon (Serge Forest) Genre: thriller Awards: best director of a drama series, best casting director at the 2019 Gémeaux Parental guidance: not recommended for children under the age of 10 (-10)

programme.title: Faits divers
programme.desc: Episode 10: The day before the revenge The Mascouche squad are stunned: it wasn't Paulo's weapon that killed Maurice Lauzon. Strangely, Bobby's gun is directly linked to the murders of Maurice Lauzon, Dave Cusson and the fake Eddy. The Orsini brothers become the prime suspects. The noose begins to tighten around Rachelle... Directed by: Stéphane Lapointe (season 2, Canada, 2018) Screenplay: Joanne Arseneau Cast: Isabelle Blais (Constance Forest), Fred-Éric Salvail (Antoine Chevrier-Marseau), Émile Proulx-Cloutier (Frédérik Bérubé), Maxime Mailloux (Jonas), Patrick Hivon (Sylvain Lauzon), Rachel Graton (Rachelle Lauzon), Alexandre Goyette (Jimmy O'Connor), Luc Senay (Paulo Fauteux), Chantal Baril (Francine Bienvenue), Roger Léger (Maurice Lauzon), Alexa-Jeanne Dubé (Zoé Forest), Guy Nadon (Serge Forest) Genre: thriller Awards: best director of a drama series, best casting director at the 2019 Gémeaux Parental guidance: not recommended for children under the age of 10 (-10)

programme.title: OPJ Pacifique Sud
programme.desc: Kelly and Jackson are on a training placement on Lifou, one of the Loyalty Islands. For Jackson, it's a psychological test more than a physical one as it brings back painful memories. A photographer is murdered in taboo territory. The investigators are confronted with the local tribe and its prerogatives... Directed by: François Bigrat (season 1, France, 2019) Cast: Yaëlle Trulès (Clarissa Hoarau), Antoine Stip (Gaspard Watson), Nathan Dellemme (Jackson Bellerose), Marielle Karabeu (Kelly Kwaté), Hindra Armede (Agathe Hoarau), Clémentine Julienne (Joséphine Fleury), Julia Paul (Manon Lambert), Alexandre Varga (Raphaël Mayer) Genre: detective

programme.title: OPJ Pacifique Sud
programme.desc: Confronted with the tribe's common law, Jackson and Kelly are finding it difficult to advance in their investigation. Clarissa uses every possible means to find her daughter, who has disappeared... Directed by: François Bigrat (season 1, France, 2019) Cast: Yaëlle Trulès (Clarissa Hoarau), Antoine Stip (Gaspard Watson), Nathan Dellemme (Jackson Bellerose), Marielle Karabeu (Kelly Kwaté), Hindra Armede (Agathe Hoarau), Clémentine Julienne (Joséphine Fleury), Julia Paul (Manon Lambert), Alexandre Varga (Raphaël Mayer) Genre: detective

programme.title: La peinture française autour du monde
Prisons sans barreaux
programme.desc:
We are bathed in an environment saturated with chemicals and electromagnetic fields. The effects of this massive exposure are felt by a growing number of people. From the experiences of scientists to the portraits of Isabelle, Kathya, Jean-François and Sylvain, we enter the unknown world of environmental hypersensitivity.

Directed by: Nicole Giguère, Isabelle Hayeur (Canada, 2019)

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Épisode 304 Johanna, mise face à ses contradictions, se retrouve au pied du mur. De son côté, Manu obtient des informations pour réorienter son enquête. Réalisation : Julien Seri, Fouad Benhammou, Amir Shadzi (saison 2, France, 2019) Distribution : Aurore Delplace (Johanna), Fred Bianconi (Virgile), Marthe Fieschi (Léa), Teilo Azaïs (Enzo), Moïse Santamaria (Manu), Maëlle Mietton (Alice), Fabrice Deville (Florent), Mélanie Maudran (Claire), Stéphane Monpetit (Eliott), Benjamin Bourgois (Alexandre), Aïssam Medhem (Akim) Genre : comédie dramatique

programme.title: TV5MONDE, le journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.
